The iSEEfgseaResults class

Source: R/iSEEfgseaResults-class.R
iSEEfgseaResults-class.Rd

The iSEEfgseaResults class is used to provide an common interface to pathway analysis results produced by the fgsea package. It provides methods to access the set of features in each pathway.

Details

This class inherits all its slots directly from its parent class DataFrame.

Constructor

iSEEfgseaResults(data, row.names = rownames(data)) creates an instance of a iSEEfgseaResults class, with:

data

A data.frame produced by fgsea::fgsea().

Supported methods

  • embedPathwaysResults(x, se, name, pathwayType, class = "fgsea", ...) embeds x in the column name of metadata(se)[["iSEEpathways"]].

Author

Kevin Rue-Albrecht

Examples

library("org.Hs.eg.db")
#> Loading required package: AnnotationDbi
#> 
library("fgsea")
library("SummarizedExperiment")

##
# Prepare pathways
##

pathways <- select(org.Hs.eg.db, keys(org.Hs.eg.db, "SYMBOL"), c("GOALL"), keytype = "SYMBOL")
#> 'select()' returned 1:many mapping between keys and columns
pathways <- subset(pathways, ONTOLOGYALL == "BP")
pathways <- unique(pathways[, c("SYMBOL", "GOALL")])
pathways <- split(pathways$SYMBOL, pathways$GOALL)

##
# Prepare gene statistics
##
gene_symbols <- unique(unlist(pathways))
gene_stats <- rnorm(length(gene_symbols))
names(gene_stats) <- gene_symbols

##
# Run pathway analysis ----
##

set.seed(42)
fgseaRes <- fgsea(pathways = pathways,
                  stats    = gene_stats,
                  minSize  = 15,
                  maxSize  = 500)
head(fgseaRes[order(pval), ])
#>       pathway         pval      padj   log2err         ES       NES size
#> 1: GO:1904994 0.0004250137 0.8976839 0.4984931 -0.5160467 -1.933192   40
#> 2: GO:0009112 0.0006474642 0.8976839 0.4772708 -0.5337062 -1.949303   34
#> 3: GO:2000242 0.0009760581 0.8976839 0.4772708  0.4078716  1.740462   75
#> 4: GO:0043507 0.0013852782 0.8976839 0.4550599 -0.4696888 -1.787353   43
#> 5: GO:0030517 0.0014936693 0.8976839 0.4550599  0.4680446  1.822152   46
#> 6: GO:0045820 0.0016424481 0.8976839 0.4550599  0.6592612  1.922224   15
#>                                 leadingEdge
#> 1:      MIR31,ETS1,MIR21,RHOA,MDK,ALOX5,...
#> 2:     CPS1,PPAT,GART,ALDH6A1,TYMS,TYMP,...
#> 3:      WNT5A,BCL2L1,RGN,GJA1,ZP3,FBXO5,...
#> 4: FZD8,FZD10,DUSP19,FGD2,SYK,TNFRSF11A,...
#> 5:    WNT5A,KIAA0319,NRP1,MT3,IFRD1,RYK,...
#> 6:  PPARA,SLC4A1,TIGAR,STAT3,NUPR1,FBP1,...

##
# Simulate a SummarizedExperiment object
##

se <- SummarizedExperiment()

##
# iSEEfgseaResults ----
##

# Embed the FGSEA results in the SummarizedExperiment object
se <- embedPathwaysResults(fgseaRes, se, name = "fgsea", class = "fgsea", pathwayType = "GO")
se
#> class: SummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 0 0 
#> metadata(1): iSEEpathways
#> assays(0):
#> rownames: NULL
#> rowData names(0):
#> colnames: NULL
#> colData names(0):

##
# Access ----
##

# TODO: create getter function
metadata(se)[["iSEEpathways"]][["fgsea"]]
